name: Acute Stronghold
description:
Play as the final warrior who is trying to go against the stronghold. 

Solving  math problems & riddles, can you defeat the dungeons and help the town?

_________________________________________________________

Controls:

*To type in pass code, click the box with your mouse*

Walk: WASD or the arrow keys

Attack: Q

Interact: E

_________________________________________________________

A Dungeon Crawler/Edutainment game created for Ludum Dare 41 submission.
